scenario_text.value:
Wait a minute... Is it just me, or are there
more spiderwebs than before?!

Ewww, there’s sticky stuff everywhere! We
can’t even get close to the door now...

I get it. This is what’s stopping the doors
from opening.

At this rate it’ll get harder and harder to
move around...

(And once we can’t move anymore, we’ll get
captured...and eaten, maybe?)

(Damn, this is messed up! I’m not gonna go
down that easily!)

Hurry up!
We gotta track the enemy down right away!

We’ll get stuck at this rate.
We have to hurry!
